document.full_text: the mavericks came to los angeles and seized a commanding 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven series that now heads to dallas.
document.title: mavericks 93, lakers 81: mavericks prevail and send lakers into panic mode
lines_and_colors: the mavericks came to los angeles and seized a commanding 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven series that now heads to dallas.
